title: HOUR 1 - Jordan, Howard & Gard, LeBron
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Jordan, Howard & Gard, LeBron
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin wonders why Michael Jordan is still one of the most popular former athletes in America--despite being out of the NBA for years. Also, it's clear that the adults failed to be adults when Wisconsin men's basketball coach Greg Gard met Michigan men's basketball coach Juwan Howard in the handshake line following the Badgers' dominating win over the Wolverines on Sunday. Finally, FS1 NBA analyst Ric Bucher stops in to discuss Michael Jordan's perpetual popularity and some possible NBA free agency moves--including where LeBron James may end his career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
